hero.sub: I build high-performance, accessible websites that are easy to maintain and scale.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Modern, maintainable websites built with the latest technologies and best practices.

services.title: UI/UX & Design Systems
services.description: Consistent design, tokens, and components that create cohesive user experiences.

services.title: Performance & SEO
services.description: Core Web Vitals optimization, accessibility compliance, and structured data implementation.

services.title: Consulting & Audits
services.description: Design system audits, code reviews, and technical strategy for existing projects.

testimonials.quote: Working with Vladimir was exceptional. He delivered a website that not only looks great but performs flawlessly. Our conversion rates improved significantly.
testimonials.author: Sarah Chen

testimonials.quote: The attention to detail and technical expertise is outstanding. Our new website is fast, accessible, and exactly what we envisioned.
testimonials.author: Marcus Rodriguez

testimonials.quote: Vladimir transformed our online presence. The website is professional, user-friendly, and has helped us attract more clients than ever before.
testimonials.author: Elena Kowalski

about.intro: I'm Vladimir Bogryashov, a frontend developer specializing in creating high-performance, accessible websites. With a focus on clean code and clear design, I help businesses establish a strong online presence that drives real results.

values.title: Clarity
values.description: Clear communication and transparent processes throughout every project.

values.title: Progress
values.description: Continuous improvement and staying current with the latest web technologies.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Open communication, regular updates, and honest feedback on project progress.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: Delivering exceptional quality and attention to detail in every line of code.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: Ready to bring your ideas to life? Whether you have a specific project in mind or just want to explore possibilities, I'm here to help you create something amazing with clean, efficient solutions.
contact.emailDescription: For detailed project discussions and formal inquiries
contact.quickResponseDescription: I'll get back to you within 24 hours, usually much sooner

contact.detailedProposalDescription: Comprehensive project plan with timeline and pricing
contact.transparencyDescription: Clear communication and honest feedback throughout
contact.readyToStartDescription: Let's discuss your project and see how we can work together to achieve your goals.
contact.ctaSubtitle: Ready to bring your vision to life? Let's discuss your project and create something amazing together.
